body_content.explanation: to increase the power in an engine using a turbocharger (= a small turbine turned by waste gases that pushes the fuel and air mixture into the engine at a higher pressure):
examples: The V10 engine has been turbocharged to boost power from 500 to 600bhp.

body_content.explanation: to make something grow or increase at a faster rate than usual or to make something much more effective:
examples: Lee, a self-made multimillionaire, promised that he would turbocharge the economy with pro-business policies.
The article shows you how to turbocharge your spreadsheet via detailed and interesting examples.
